name: hapi-bookshelf-models2
description: Hapi Plugin to Register Bookshelf Models

scripts.release:major: ./node_modules/.bin/changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: ./node_modules/.bin/changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: ./node_modules/.bin/changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Max Rostov <ktulchonok@gmail.com>
